text: Va dar custucui on qavm (kofiron) susti makuned, (zero sust sudani dil ʙoisi sust sudani ʙadan megardad va sustii ʙadan ʙoisi notavoni dar ʙaroʙari dusmanon mesavad.) Agar sumo zaxmi va darmand mesaved. Onho niz hamon tavr, ki sumo dardmand mesaved, darmand mesavand, vale sumo az Alloh cizero umed dored, ki onon umed nadorand. Va Alloh donovu hakim ast
